channel.title: One file client?
channel.description: Well people are starting to dupe on my server with a different client, they are finding my UID. I want to make my client only 1 file so people can't find my UID from the signlink. Im sure I can somehow make my client into a jar or exe and I have a Jar Maker, I just don't know how to use it. I need some major help - please help!

item.title: One file client?
item.dc:creator: @Markian Markian
item.description:
@Markian wrote:

zyle1992:

One thing you could do is change your UID once more, compile signlink.java, and then remove signlink.java from the client files, and put it on your computer somewhere.

Well I only gave them the .class files and made them hidden, but they decompiled it and found the UID. I’m just having trouble with JAR Maker because once I make all the files into a JAR theres only that Jar and I make a run.bat open that JAR and it says invalid or corrupted or something like that. I need to find out how to succesfully make it into a JAR can anyone help me? I am using a delta client - basically bluurs client.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 03, 2009, 01:34:35 am[/size][hr]Oh btw, when I try to open my jarred client here is what comes up: [br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 03, 2009, 12:54:35 pm[/size][hr]Oh btw, when I Jar it - it doesn’t show the GUI.

Read full topic

item.title: One file client?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

One thing you could do is change your UID once more, compile signlink.java, and then remove signlink.java from the client files, and put it on your computer somewhere.

Read full topic

Well people are starting to dupe on my server with a different client, they are finding my UID. I want to make my client only 1 file so people can’t find my UID from the signlink.
